channel.description: Twitter feed for: @KAndrewHuang. Generated by nitter.freedit.eu

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: I‚Äôve joined @conduitxyz, leading our Ecosystem Partnerships! Conduit handles 60% of Ethereum‚Äôs onchain compute by offering the most performant and reliable infrastructure and is backed by top investors like @paradigm and @HaunVentures.
Conduit is powering 55+ mainnet (and 300+ testnet) networks while processing billions of monthly RPC calls. We work with standout customers like @ProofofPlay, @Blackbird_xyz, @Synthetix_io, and @Azuki.
Plus, we have 75+ ecosystem partners like @arbitrum, @Optimism, @celestia, @eigenlayer, @thirdweb, @circle, @dune, @privy_io, @RelayProtocol, and dozens more! (DM to chat about partnering with our ecosystem!)
My goal is to connect top-notch builders with technical partners while continuously and holistically strengthening our offering. Excited to advance Conduit‚Äôs mission to scale Ethereum!
item.dc:creator: @AndyDotETH
item.description:
I‚Äôve joined @conduitxyz, leading our Ecosystem Partnerships! Conduit handles 60% of Ethereum‚Äôs onchain compute by offering the most performant and reliable infrastructure and is backed by top investors like @paradigm and @HaunVentures.

Conduit is powering 55+ mainnet (and 300+ testnet) networks while processing billions of monthly RPC calls. We work with standout customers like @ProofofPlay, @Blackbird_xyz, @Synthetix_io, and @Azuki.

Plus, we have 75+ ecosystem partners like @arbitrum, @Optimism, @celestia, @eigenlayer, @thirdweb, @circle, @dune, @privy_io, @RelayProtocol, and dozens more! (DM to chat about partnering with our ecosystem!)

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: For 2025 we need Fusaka on L1 with PeerDAS, ideally with 48/72 blob target/limit
Let's aim to get a Fusaka testnet with these blob parameters running the day after Pectra goes live.
item.dc:creator: @VitalikButerin

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: The @blackbird_xyz Flynet is now live.
Built with @arbitrum and settling on @base with onboarding by @privy_io, Flynet powers Blackbird: the only restaurant loyalty app that pays you to eat.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
The @blackbird_xyz Flynet is now live.

Built with @arbitrum and settling on @base with onboarding by @privy_io, Flynet powers Blackbird: the only restaurant loyalty app that pays you to eat.

nitter.freedit.eu/blackbird_xyz/status/1895167201646399785#m

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: üöÄ The future of restaurant payments starts now.
Flynet is live‚Äîour purpose-built transaction network designed to cut fees, give restaurants control over their data, and create a new economy of loyalty.
Restaurants deserve better. This is how they get it.
üìñ Read more from our CEO and founder, @benleventhal: https://bit.ly/4gZtY1E
@Arbitrum @Coinbase @Base @conduitxyz @Privy_io

item.title:
RT by @KAndrewHuang: New chain! @perenniallabs is the intents-powered perps DEX for the @base ecosystem, launching w/ @goldskyio, @RelayProtocol, @privy_io, @circle's Bridged USDC standard, & @celestia underneath.
Perennial is also one of the first to partner with @SuccinctLabs for ZK fraud proofs!
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
New chain! @perenniallabs is the intents-powered perps DEX for the @base ecosystem, launching w/ @goldskyio, @RelayProtocol, @privy_io, @circle's Bridged USDC standard, & @celestia underneath.

Perennial is also one of the first to partner with @SuccinctLabs for ZK fraud proofs!
